title: Ticket #4355: condor_off, condor_reconfig, etc don't know about daemons like defrag
description:
The client tools based on tool.cpp haven't kept up with the creation of new daemons such as defrag & gangliad. New arguments should be added to these tools to bring them up to date.

Even worse, the command line parsing is quite primitive, resulting in unexpected behavior, for instance until 8.1.6 condor_off -defrag would parse as condor_off -debug which would turn off all of the daemons except the master. The command line parsing should be brought up to date.
